Package lu.uni.geko.resources

The base package of the resources plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RefinedResourceLoaderExt The interface to be implemented by clients that extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.resources.refinedresourceloaderext.
ResourceLoader The common supertype for simple and refined resource loaders defining that resource loaders can be initialised and are responsible for resource with certain file extensions.
SimpleResourceLoaderExt The interface to be implemented by clients that extend the extension point lu.uni.geko.resources.simpleresourceloaderext.
 

Class Summary
DefaultSimpleResourceLoader The default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.resources.simpleresourceloaderext using a thread local resource set and the default XMI resource factory.
DefaultSimpleResourceLoaderFactory A factory for the DefaultSimpleResourceLoader ensuring that only one instance is used although it is accessed by Eclipse's extension mechanism.
MainResourceLoader A utility class to access the functionality provided by extensions of the SimpleResourceLoaderExt and RefinedResourceLoaderExt extension points.
SimpleResourceLoaderWrapper A default implementation of the extension point lu.uni.geko.resources.refinedresourceloaderext that wraps a simple resource loader so that it can be used like a refined resource loader (object adapter pattern).
 

Package lu.uni.geko.resources Description

The base package of the resources plug-in for GeKo, a generic model weaver. Responsible for loading and storing all model resources.
